comments.body:
maybe instructions on how to load one though because the apparmor docs are pretty bad its:

```
$ apparmor_parser -r -W /path/to/profile
```

to unload it:

```
$ apparmor_parser -R /path/to/profile
```

Also debugging apparmor is a huge pain point so we might some stuff like I wrote up here (but its nowhere near as verbose as I wish it was):
https://github.com/docker/docker/blob/master/docs/security/apparmor.md#debug-apparmor
Thanks. I wasn't sure where to put this, so I added it to an "Appendix". Once the feature is done I'll convert this to proper documentation and add a lot more details around these areas.
